title: About
subtitle: About this site and Travis
intro: Travis is a web developer and he made a script that made this site.
body: <h2>Travis Hardiman</h2><p>Travis is a web developer who likes beer and funny stuff. He lives in Rochester, NY.</p><h2>Traviblog</h2><p>Traviblog started out in 2002ish as an AIM Sub-Profile that I wrote using Classic ASP and Access. It was later migrated to a .Text blog which worked well for awhile. Then it was migrated to dasBlog which didn't work as well.</p><p>This site uses JSON for its data source to generate static files. I named the script <a href='https://github.com/dieseltravis/suo'>suo</a> because it was short, untaken, and latin is neat.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2014-04-06

About

About this site and Travis

Travis Hardiman

Travis is a web developer who likes beer and funny stuff. He lives in Rochester, NY.

Traviblog

Traviblog started out in 2002ish as an AIM Sub-Profile that I wrote using Classic ASP and Access. It was later migrated to a .Text blog which worked well for awhile. Then it was migrated to dasBlog which didn't work as well.

This site uses JSON for its data source to generate static files. I named the script suo because it was short, untaken, and latin is neat.
